attacks.name: Miracle Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Condition. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

abilities.name: Hidden Threads
abilities.text: Your opponent's Pokémon VSTAR's attacks cost Colorless more. You can't apply more than 1 Hidden Threads Ability at a time.

attacks.name: Bright Beam
attacks.text: You may discard up to 3 Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 70 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Noble Light
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Regal Blender
attacks.text: You may move any amount of Energy from your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Star Winder
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

abilities.name: Surprise Spores
abilities.text: During your opponent's turn, if this Pokémon is discarded from your hand by an effect of an attack or Ability from your opponent's Pokémon, or by an effect of your opponent's Item or Supporter cards, discard your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Hypno Hammer
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Energy Digging
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Leaf Drain
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Needle Line
abilities.text: If your Active Chesnaught V is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if it is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Touchdown
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Elegant Heal
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aroma Shot
attacks.text: This Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Gaze
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Scorching Breath
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fighting Tackle
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon V, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Heat Boost
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. During this turn, your Fire Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Assisting Flame
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sparkling Wing
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: White Blaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Flare Parade
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Serena card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Flare Parade
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Serena card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Energy Crush
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Quick Dive
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Merciless Strike
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Reprisal
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gritty Claws
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, it is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Secret Attack
attacks.text: Choose an attack from 1 of this Pokémon's previous Evolutions and use it as this attack.

attacks.name: Flare Shot
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Snow Mirage
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon that have an Ability. 0 Silvery Snow Star 70× This attack does 70 damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon V in play. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Primal Guidance
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon that evolve from an Item card that has “Fossil" in its name and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Wild Freeze
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Gulp Down
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokémon can't use that attack.

abilities.text: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 2 cards.

name: Brandon
rules: You can use this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Draw a card for each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Candice
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Capturing Aroma
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Evolution Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If tails, search your deck for a Basic Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Earthen Seal Stone
rules: The Pokémon V this card is attached to can use the VSTAR Power on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)ColorlessColorlessColorless Star GravityPut damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon V until its remaining HP is 100. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

name: Emergency Jelly
rules: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to has 30 HP or less remaining and has any damage counters on it, heal 120 damage from it. If you healed any damage in this way, discard this card.

name: Forest Seal Stone
rules: The Pokémon V this card is attached to can use the VSTAR Power on this card.Ability: Star AlchemyDuring your turn, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

name: Furisode Girl
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck. You may switch that Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Gym Trainer
rules: Draw 2 cards. If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lance
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Dragon Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Leafy Camo Poncho
rules: Whenever your opponent plays a Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to the Pokémon VSTAR or Pokémon VMAX this card is attached to.

name: Primordial Altar
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may look at the top card of their deck. They may discard that card.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Professor Laventon
rules: Put up to 3 Pokémon that have “Hisuian" in their names from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Quad Stone
rules: You may use 4 Quad Stone cards at once.• If you used 1 card, heal 10 damage from your Active Pokémon.• If you used 4 cards, heal all damage from each of your Pokémon. (This effect works one time for 4 cards.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Serena
rules: Choose 1:• Discard up to 3 cards from your hand. (You must discard at least 1 card.) If you do, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.• Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon V with their Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Unidentified Fossil
rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Colorless Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may discard this card from play.This card can't retreat.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Wallace
rules: Draw 3 cards. Your opponent may draw a card. If they do, draw 1 more card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Worker
rules: Draw 3 cards. Discard a Stadium in play.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Regenerative Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.Whenever you play a Pokémon from your hand to evolve the Pokémon V this card is attached to, heal 100 damage from that Pokémon.

name: V Guard Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.The Pokémon this card is attached to takes 30 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon V (after applying Weakness and Resistance). This effect can't be applied more than once at a time to the same Pokémon.

abilities.text: If your Active Chesnaught V is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if it is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Primal Guidance
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon that evolve from an Item card that has “Fossil" in its name and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Tentacle Lock
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Switching Bolt
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lightning Wall
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 100 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shady Stamp
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Victory Symbol
attacks.text: If you use this attack when you have only 1 Prize card remaining, you win this game.

attacks.name: Shady Stamp
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Victory Symbol
attacks.text: If you use this attack when you have only 1 Prize card remaining, you win this game.

attacks.name: Pouty Slap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chomp Down
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

abilities.name: Irresistible Force
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may move a Fighting Energy from 1 of your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pursuit Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If that Pokémon retreated from the Active Spot during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 120 damage instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Shrieking Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pursuit Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If that Pokémon retreated from the Active Spot during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 120 damage instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Shrieking Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Gear Throw
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Special Laser
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Celestial Roar
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Laser
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Celestial Roar
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Laser
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Read the Wind
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Aero Dive
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Read the Wind
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Aero Dive
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play.

abilities.name: Reviving Flame
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, attach up to 4 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Rainbow Burn
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each type of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Brandon
rules: You can use this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Draw a card for each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Candice
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Furisode Girl
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck. You may switch that Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Gym Trainer
rules: Draw 2 cards. If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lance
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Dragon Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Serena
rules: Choose 1:• Discard up to 3 cards from your hand. (You must discard at least 1 card.) If you do, draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.• Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon V with their Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Wallace
rules: Draw 3 cards. Your opponent may draw a card. If they do, draw 1 more card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Worker
rules: Draw 3 cards. Discard a Stadium in play.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: Regal Blender
attacks.text: You may move any amount of Energy from your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Star Winder
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Snow Mirage
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon that have an Ability. 0 Silvery Snow Star 70× This attack does 70 damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon V in play. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

abilities.name: Transistor
abilities.text: Your Basic Lightning Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Max Thunder and Lightning
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Tri Power
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 70 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Star Cipher
attacks.text: Until this Pokémon leaves play, it gains an Ability that has the effect “The Weakness of each of your opponent's Pokémon in play is now Psychic. (The amount of Weakness doesn't change.)" (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

abilities.name: Star Rondo
abilities.text: During your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon. If you do, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Sudden Eater
attacks.text: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Legacy Star
abilities.text: During your turn, you may discard the top 7 cards of your deck. Then, put up to 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Apex Dragon
attacks.text: Choose an attack from a Dragon Pokémon in your discard pile and use it as this attack.

abilities.name: Summoning Star
abilities.text: During your turn, you may put up to 2 Colorless Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box from your discard pile onto your Bench. (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes.) (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Tempest Dive
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Tempest Dive
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play.

name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Gapejaw Bog
rules: Whenever either player puts a Basic Pokémon from their hand onto their Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Leafy Camo Poncho
rules: Whenever your opponent plays a Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to the Pokémon VSTAR or Pokémon VMAX this card is attached to.

name: V Guard Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.The Pokémon this card is attached to takes 30 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon V (after applying Weakness and Resistance). This effect can't be applied more than once at a time to the same Pokémon.
